page.title: 09TWO INTERVIEWS
page.content:
Basil Prior was Mayor in 1984. He is now retired and Manager of Prior's Taxis. He is Didcot born and bred. He thinks that Didcot is a fantastic place with a great future. He relates that his father used to boast that he could name every man, woman and child in Didcot. He is pleased that the town is expanding.
Barbara Horne became Mayoress after Basil Prior. Her main preoccupation is with shops and light industry. She is concerned that not all the shop premises are occupied. Some light industry has already been attracted to the area and Mrs Horne hopes that a lot more will follow. In her time in Didcot there have been many changes. It has grown in population and is continuing to grow.
